string-array.name: laptop_name
string-array.item: Acer Aspire 5 Slim - Creator Edition Laptop

string-array.name: laptop_highlights
string-array.item: Get Better Visual on Colorful Display (100% sRGB) and Higher Resolution (2.5K), 2X Longer Battery Life and Get Instant Wake on every activity with Intel Evo Certified, Spotlight Your Virtual Presence with FHD Camera and Noise Cancellation.
Work or Play, Feel the powerful machine to create faster comes with OLED-Eyesafe™ for cinematic entertainment experience.

Trendy, all metal sleek chassis (1.2kg-15.9mm), elevated hinge design, Rich and bright color (100% sRGB FHD IPS Panel in ultra-narrow bezels 85,73%), PCIe Gen4 SSD, Multiple Cooling Boost (Fn+F), Acer PurifiedVoice (Noise Cancellation)

The World’s Lightest 16” Premium Laptop. The Lightest with 1.1kg, up to 10.5 hours with fast charge, and 2X Stronger than normal alumunium, Stunning Visual in Your Pocket. Experience sensational color on 4K OLED with cinema-grade 100% DCI-P3 and safe for eyes guarantee (TUV EyeSafe), Center of Attraction. “Chameleon” sparkling blue effect presenting Elegant, Intelligent and Creativity

Stylish and Powerful for Content Creation with New Powerful Nvidia Graphics, Pumping out a consistently rich and bright color with 100% sRGB FHD IPS Panel in ultra-narrow bezels 85,73%, Up to 20% Airflow improvement with All New Fan Design, Air Inlet Keyboard Design and Wider Air Vent.

Luxury ultraportable design with high durability aerospace-grade aluminium, Gaming power-on by 12th Gen Intel® Core™ processor (+47% performance) with Intel Evo Certification and high-performing Dual Fan cooling system, 2K Touch Display with Antimicrobial Corning Glass

Full Antimicrobial Solutions (on screen, touchpad, and all surfaces), Durable and lighweight with only 1kg with Mg-Li and Mg-Al metal chassis, Easy to carry, smaller dimention with 90% body ratio display, All new dual pipe cooling system.

Trendy, all metal sleek chassis. 1.2kg-15.9mm and elevated hinge design, Rich and bright color with 100% sRGB FHD IPS Panel in ultra-narrow bezels 85,73%, Performance upgrade 20% compared to previous gen processor and multiple cooling modes.

268% more detail and sharpen resolution with 2K display, compared to HD display, 18% more vertical view with 3:2 screen ratio, 1.4X longer battery life, up to 18 hours battery life, Durable and lighweight with only 1.2 kg with Mg-Li and Mg-Al metal chassis.

Choose Your Power on Multiple Cooling Modes and Enjoy Up to 20% Higher Performance, Fastest and Reliable Connectivity with Thunderbolt 4 and Wifi 6E, Brighter Camera with TNR Technology and AI Noise Cancellation (Acer PurifiedVoice)

string-array.name: laptop_cpu
string-array.item: Intel Core i7–12700H processor (Intel Evo Certified)

string-array.name: laptop_ram
string-array.item: 16 GB of LPDDR5 Dual Channel memory

string-array.name: laptop_screen
string-array.item: 14.0" QHD 2560 x 1440, IPS Display, high-brightness (300nits) Acer ComfyView™ LED-backlit TFT LCD, 16:9 aspect ratio, color gamut sRGB 100%
14" 2.8K (2880 x 1800), OLED with TUV Rheinland EyeSafe, 100% DCI-P3, 90 Hz, 0.2ms, Display HDR 500, 500 nits, 16:10 aspect ratio.
14" IPS Full HD (1920 x 1080), high-brightness (300nits), Acer ComfyView™ LED-backlit TFT LCD, 100% sRGB
16" 4K (3840 x 2400), OLED with TUV Rheinland EyeSafe, 100% DCI-P3, 60 Hz, 0.2ms, Display HDR 500, 400 nits, 16:10 aspect ratio.
14" IPS, Full HD (1920 x 1080), high-brightness (300nits) Acer ComfyView™ LED-backlit TFT LCD, 100% sRGB
14.0" IPS, WQXGA (QHD) 2560 x 1600, 16:10, 100% sRGB, 425 nits. Acer CineCrystal™ LED-backlit TFT LCD, supporting multi-touch and Antibacterial Corning Gorilla glass"
14" IPS Full HD (1920 x 1080), high-brightness (340 nits) Acer ComfyView™ LED-backlit TFT LCD, multi-touch, 100% sRGB.
14" IPS Full HD (1920 x 1080), 100% sRGB, high-brightness (300nits) Acer ComfyView™ (nonglare) LED-backlit TFT LCD, 16:9,Wide viewing angle up to 170 degrees, Mercury free, environment friendly
13.5" VertiView display IPS 2K (2256 x 1504), Acer CineCrystal™ LED-backlit TFT LCD, 3:2 aspect ratio, 100% sRGB, Wide viewing angle up to 170 degrees.
15.6", Full HD (1920 x 1080), IPS, Acer ComfyView™ LED-backlit TFT LCD

string-array.item: Acer Purified Voice (Noise Cancellation), FHD Camera, Thunderbolt 4™
Smart Fingerprint, Thunderbolt 4, Bluelight Shield Technology
Acer PurifiedVoice (Noise Cancellation) and FHD Camera with Acer TNR
Fingerprint, Backlight Keyboard, Multiple Cooling Modes
Thunderbolt, AI Noise Reduction, HD TNR
